variables.name: advanced_ai_form.metadata

aiPrompts.name: thanolist
aiPrompts.system: You analyze equities and produce validated QRT outputs per the user's format.
aiPrompts.prompt: You are Thanolist. Analyze {{ticker}} for a {{strategy}} trade over {{time_horizon}} with {{confidence}}% confidence. Prioritize price < $3 (RH={{rh_tradable}}), exchange {{exchange}}, and market {{market_status}}. Catalyst: {{primary_catalyst}} ({{catalyst_detail}}, recency {{catalyst_recency}} on {{event_date}}). Sentiment: news {{news_sentiment}}, social bull/bear {{social_bull_ratio}}, velocity {{social_velocity}}, source {{source_quality}}. Technicals: trend {{trend_state}}, RSI {{rsi_14}}, MA stack {{ma_stack}}, 200MA {{ma200_relation}}, MACD {{macd_state}}, BB {{bb_position}}, S/R {{sr_distance}}, gap {{gap_status}}, VWAP {{vwap_relation}}. Liquidity: avg vol 7d {{avg_vol_7d}}, $ volume {{dollar_vol}}, spread {{bid_ask_spread}}, float {{float_size}}, DTC {{short_interest_dtc}}, dark pool {{darkpool_signal}}. Volatility: ATR% {{atr_pct}}, HV30 {{hv_30}}, halts {{halt_history}}. Fundamentals: runway {{cash_runway}}, revenue {{rev_trend}}, surprise {{earn_surprise}}, dilution {{dilution_risk}}, peers {{peers_strength}}. Options: UOA {{uoa_flag}}, GEX {{gex_state}}, IV rank {{ivrank}}. Macro: tide {{macro_tide}}, sector flow {{sector_flow}}, VIX {{vix_regime}}. Risk: max position {{max_portfolio_pct}}, stop {{stop_style}}, R:R {{rr_min}}. Provide QRT, data validation, analysis, risks, and team share summary per my output format.

aiPrompts.name: team_share
aiPrompts.system: You format a concise team-ready status message.

packs.name: Advanced AI Form (Imported)
packs.description: Grouping of converted elements from advanced_ai_form.json
